column4: is compiz really useful, or just cool to show off? I guess I am asking how many of you use compiz or other compisite graphics.. all the time?
compiz is useful ONLY if you have a Nvidia card
people, please try to keep to english
by 'useful' I mean, does running compiz, et al become something one does to be clever or to show off, or to become really efficient and productive?
